DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate V-Raser diode laser system investigational Nail Fungus Handpiece treatment onychomycosis .
DOC.criteria: Confirmed subungual onychomycosis great toe extend eponychium Fitzpatrick Skin Type IIV Written verbal inform consent Able comply study instruction return clinic require visit Agrees refrain active topical , laser lightbased treatment great toe Agrees use Naftin Gel toe prevent/control tinea pedis Pregnancy , breastfeed plan become pregnant History cutaneous photosensitivity , porphyria hypersensitivity porphyrin photodermatoses Any skin pathology condition could interfere evaluation require use interfere topical systemic therapy Coagulation disorder current use anticoagulation medication ( include aspirin use great 81 mg per day ) Any condition , investigator 's opinion , would make unsafe subject participate Enrolled investigational drug device trial , treat investigational device receive investigational drug within 30 day Oral Lamisil within 1 year , Sporanox overthecounter topicals within 1 month , prescription antifungal medication topicals within 6 month Evidence diabetic neuropathy peripheral vascular disease relate diabetes , loss protective sensation affect foot Psoriasis , lichen planus , infection involve lunula , prior surgical treatment affect great toe within 1 year , history trauma affect great toe Immunocompromised status , exist ( history ) cancer/skin malignancy Distal nail thickness great 2mm affect great toenail
